name: Hacker Dojo - Move to the new home
tagline: Status of the move to the new home, pending action items and how volunteers can help
body:
# Current Action Items

Action items for a successful move

* Volunteers needed * Please look through the action items and see if you can help with any of the items in the list * Please feel free to comment on the action items * Please feel free to assign some of the items to yourself # Create a new action item or issue

New action item or issue page

* Please create a new action item or issue that you think needs to be addressed before, during or after the move to the new home # Analysis of the potential new homes * Coming soon... # New location layout plan * Coming soon...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
